label: uncl6415
comment: Code qualifying the type of clinical information.

values.label: Symptom
values.comment: Change in the physical or mental condition of a person regarded as an evidence of a disease.

values.label: Discharge diagnosis
values.comment: Medical diagnosis at the time of discharge.

values.label: Prognosis
values.comment: Information regarding the probable course and/or termination of a disease.

values.label: Examination result
values.comment: Information regarding the result of a medical examination.

values.label: Laboratory analysis result
values.comment: Information regarding the result of a laboratory analysis.

values.label: Medicinal treatment
values.comment: Information regarding a treatment with medicinal products.

values.label: Patient medical instruction
values.comment: Information regarding the medical instruction given to a patient.

values.label: Medical instruction to physician
values.comment: Information regarding the medical instruction given to a physician.
